name: Haskell Dev Container (ghcup)
postCreateCommand: apt-get update && apt-get install -y grc && curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://get-ghcup.haskell.org | BOOTSTRAP_HASKELL_NONINTERACTIVE=1 BOOTSTRAP_HASKELL_GHC_VERSION=recommended BOOTSTRAP_HASKELL_CABAL_VERSION=recommended BOOTSTRAP_HASKELL_HLS_VERSION=recommended sh && (grep -qxF 'source /root/.ghcup/env' /root/.bashrc || echo 'source /root/.ghcup/env' >> /root/.bashrc) && (grep -qxF 'source /workspace/.devcontainer/.bashrc' /root/.bashrc || echo 'source /workspace/.devcontainer/.bashrc' >> /root/.bashrc) && mkdir -p /root/.grc && cp /workspace/.devcontainer/cabal /root/.grc/cabal && . /root/.ghcup/env && cabal update && cabal build all
